data.text: @CeCeLibrarian @_AJAvery @MG_BookBot @neilhimself Don’t worry, Christina!! It happens!! And MILK made it through (happily for me, since it was my vote, for the reasons you mentioned and more)!!
@_AJAvery @MG_BookBot @neilhimself I loved this book. It was so funny to me. It makes for a great read aloud. I'm so made that I missed voting yesterday. It was such a busy day 😭
@MG_BookBot Rooftoppers
@MG_BookBot I adore Chatlotte and Wilbur but today I’d like to see #Rooftoppers come out on top..... come on @kdbrundell fans. Vote vote vote!!
@MG_BookBot @Jarrett_Lerner Charlotte’s Web 🕷all the way, had a lasting impression on me. ❤️📚
@MG_BookBot #MGBOOKBATTLE is impossible today! I love all four books, but my vote will go to #Rooftoppers or #TheGirlWhoDrankTheMoon. Still undecided...
@MG_BookBot Not fair that one
@MG_BookBot No Imagination people, not another classic book winning. Come on! #MGBOOKBATTLE
@MG_BookBot Much as I love Charlotte's Web, I had to vote for Girl Who Drank the Moon, because I absolutely ADORED it, and I want it to go on.
@_AJAvery @MG_BookBot @neilhimself Such a hard choice today! My book club are loving Fortunately 😊
@erinvarley @MG_BookBot But it gets harder to pick too. 🙁
@erinvarley @MG_BookBot Me too, I feel so accomplished 🙂

@_AJAvery @neilhimself @MG_BookBot @theshirtlist @Punksthetic @TeePublic ... on the other hand, maybe @Twitter should rather listen to it's users sometimes.
#nohatespeech

@_AJAvery @neilhimself @MG_BookBot @theshirtlist @Punksthetic @TeePublic I know ... I should buy the shirt and finally start reading this book.
#TeamMilk
@MG_BookBot I think this is the 1st day that I've read all four choices!!
@UEberLauch @neilhimself @MG_BookBot @theshirtlist @Punksthetic @TeePublic Twitter is trying to tell you something #VoteMilk #MGBOOKBATTLE

@JennyHolderLiv @MG_BookBot Couldn’t have said it any better myself, Jenny! Thank you for sharing! This is one of those special books capable of changing a kid’s mind about reading and books and of igniting a passion for both!
@MG_BookBot A terrible choice because I loved #THEGIRLWHODRANKTHEMOON, but c’mon CHARLOTTE!
@_AJAvery @MG_BookBot @neilhimself YES THIS BOOK IS EXCELLENT!

@_AJAvery @neilhimself @MG_BookBot Just had that next to your tweet 😀

https://t.co/VwZAftAIKX

@MG_BookBot Fortunately, I am #TeamMilk today :) #MGBOOKBATTLE 
Even though I don't actually drink milk I understand the vital role that it can play in saving the cosmos! @neilhimself https://t.co/GCVbLCeVTQ

@MG_BookBot Today I’ve chosen Fortunately The Milk. Partly because it’s strange, funny and wonderful and partly because I saw it turn a struggling and reluctant child reader into a keen reader in front of my eyes!
